channel.title: Grid Releases
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.1
item.description:
1.1 Release Notes

  • New: the hotkey acts as a toggle, deactivating Grid if it’s already active.
  • Fixed: Grid has a default shortcut of ⌥⌘` for new users.
  • Fixed: changing screen resolutions or adding/removing screens is handled gracefully.
